plans.title: The Local Launch
features: Primary Goal: Local Map Pack & Foundational Visibility
Keywords Targeted (Max): Up to 15 High-Intent Local Keywords
Technical SEO Audit: Foundational Audit & Critical Fixes
On-Page Optimization: 5 Key Service/Location Pages
Content Creation (Per Month): 1 Blog/Local Guide (500-800 words)
Local SEO: Full Google Business Profile (GBP) Optimization & Weekly Posts
Link Building (Off-Page): 2-3 High-Quality Niche Citations/Month
Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO): -
Reporting & Strategy: Standard Monthly Report
Dedicated Expert: SEO Specialist (Shared Resource)
Contract Term: 6-Month Minimum

plans.title: The Growth Accelerator
features: Primary Goal: High Organic Traffic & Lead Generation
Keywords Targeted (Max): Up to 40 Transactional & Informational Keywords
Technical SEO Audit: Comprehensive Monthly Audit & Fixes
On-Page Optimization: 10-15 Existing Pages + New Content Optimization
Content Creation (Per Month): 2 High-Value Blog Posts (1000-1500 words)
Local SEO: All of Local Launch + 50 Local Citations/Month
Link Building (Off-Page): 1-2 Authoritative Guest Posts/Month (White-Hat Outreach)
Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO): Basic CRO Recommendations
Reporting & Strategy: In-Depth Monthly Report & Strategy Call
Dedicated Expert: Senior SEO Strategist
Contract Term: 6-Month Minimum

plans.title: The Market Dominator
features: Primary Goal: Maximize Conversions & Market Share
Keywords Targeted (Max): 60+ Keywords Across All Funnel Stages
Technical SEO Audit: Enterprise-Level Audit, Schema & Site Architecture
On-Page Optimization: Full Website Optimization (Up to 50 Pages)
Content Creation (Per Month): 4+ Expert Articles/Content Hub Development
Local SEO: Multi-Location Strategy & Advanced Reputation Management
Link Building (Off-Page): Aggressive, Strategic Link Acquisition & Digital PR Campaigns
Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO): Dedicated Monthly CRO Audit & Implementation
Reporting & Strategy: Weekly Performance Review & Dedicated Project Manager
Dedicated Expert: Dedicated SEO Expert & Team Lead
Contract Term: 12-Month Minimum (Recommended)
